脠字的基本解释

脠
shān
生肉酱。

脠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shān］
［《廣韻》式連切，平仙，書。］
［《廣韻》丑延切，平仙，徹。］
生肉酱。

脠字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　脠； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页983第14
【唐韻】丑連切【集韻】尸連切，?音羶。【說文】生肉醬也。【釋名】生脠，以一分膾，二分細切，合和挻攪之也。又【齊民要術】有燥脠法。　又【廣韻】丑延切【集韻】抽延切，?音鯅。【廣韻】魚醢也。

脠字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
脠字的起名意思

暂无。

Hu
shān
Raw meat sauce.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shān］
["Guangyun" style continuous cutting, Pingxian, book. ]
["Guangyun" ugly extension cut, flat immortal, thorough. ]
Raw meat sauce.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [Department of meat characters] 　脠; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 983 14
[Tang Yun] Ugly continuous cutting [Jiyun] Continuous cutting of corpses, mutton. [Said the text] also raw meat sauce. [Release name] Raw 脠, one part 脍, two parts finely sliced, combined and stirred. Also 【Qi Min Yao Shu】There is a method of dryness.　[Guangyun] Ugly Yanqie【Jiyun】Extended Yanqie,? Yin 鯅. [Guang Yun] Fish glutinous rice also.
